Package access

Class JpaAccess

java.lang.Object
access.JpaAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
@Component public final class JpaAccess extends Object implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
Central access point for JPA-related resources within the library.

This class manages a DataSource and an EntityManager, providing methods to access the underlying JDBC connection as well as the JPA metamodel. It supports both Spring-based initialization (as a singleton bean via @Component) and manual initialization for non-Spring environments vis create(DataSource, EntityManager).

The class is final and designed as a singleton; instances are managed internally via the JpaAccessHolder.

Author:
Felix Seggeb√§ing

  • Constructor Details

    • JpaAccess

      @Autowired public JpaAccess(DataSource dataSource, jakarta.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
      Constructs a new JpaAccess instance with the given DataSource and EntityManager.

      Both arguments must be non-null. This constructor is typically used by the Spring framework for dependency injection. If you do not intend to use the spring framework, please do not call this manually but use create(DataSource, EntityManager) instead.

      Parameters:
      dataSource - the source for obtaining JDBC connections; must not be null
      entityManager - the entity manager providing access to the JPA metamodel; must not be null
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if either dataSource or entityManager is null

      public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Returns a new JDBC Connection from the underlying DataSource.

      Throws:

    • create

      public static void create(DataSource dataSource, jakarta.persistence.EntityManager entityManager)
      Users who do not use the spring framework or don't want to register this bean for some other reason must call this method instead.
      Parameters:
      dataSource - the source for the connections fetchable from the provider
      entityManager - the source of the metamodel fetchable from the provider
